issue.title: [C++] Add arrowConfig.cmake generation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3642](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3642). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This allows simple usage of Arrow in C++ packages using `find_package(arrow)` with no additional `FindArrow.cmake` in `cmake_modules`.
